lexUnit.name: cross.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to place a pair of extremities across each other

sentence.text: Meanwhile -- and he crossed his arms as it to underline the point -- nobody gets in and nobody gets out .
Still with your arms straight , flex your hands and cross your arms low in front of you , hands together .
Turning off the tape , he lay on the bottom bunk and crossed his arms under his head .
Lizzy faced her mother and crossed her arms over her breasts .
Bishop crossed his arms .
Michele sat back and crossed his arms .
Nicolo scowled , leaned back against the desk , and crossed his arms over his chest .
Speechless for a moment , Ashley could not decide whether to scream , cross her arms protectively over her chest , or to hit him .
Once inside the auction room , it 's just a matter of crossing your fingers and hoping somebody takes a fancy to it , too .
Fragolli crossed the first two fingers of each hand in the universal Russian sign for prison and everything connected with it .
` Well , cross your legs , " said Vivienne , now desperate , ` and get down here right away . "
She sat back in her chair , crossed her legs slowly .
Lisa took a deep breath and crossed her slim trousered legs .
I sat back and crossed my legs .
Luke settled back in the chair , crossing his long legs as he stared sideways at her .
Raise both legs in the air , crossing them at the ankles ; bend your legs a little .
She turned herself sideways to the audience , tipped the boater low down over her nose , stuck her hands in the pockets of her jacket and crossed one foot over another .
Sylvie , the actress , rearranged her broad-brimmed hat , crossed one tapering leg over another and smoothed a stocking .
In the meantime she was stiff from sitting still ; she crossed one knee over the other .
She crossed one suede-booted leg over the other , and toyed with the belt of her Burberry , her green eyes unfocused on the passing scenery .
One of the easiest blocks in kung fu is the ` X block " , in which the practitioner crosses one wrist over the other to form a cross .
Lying on your side , cross your right leg over your left leg .
